articles.title: 15 years of Luck By Chance: Sanjay Kapoor says he received praise but no work for 5 years after the Zoya Akhtar directorial - The Indian Express
articles.description: On Luck By Chance's 15th anniversary, actor Sanjay Kapoor shares how contrary to expectations, his performance in the Zoya Akhtar directorial didn't translate into more work.
articles.content: Luck By Chance, which starred Farhan Akhtar and Konkona Sen Sharma in the lead roles, marked Zoya Akhtars directorial debut. The film was released 15 years ago today on January 30, 2009. And while it… [+2705 chars]

articles.title: Nick Jonas stopped at Mumbai airport after performing at Lollapalooza India music festival - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Nick Jonas was stopped at the Mumbai airport after he had forgotten his tickets on his way to the United States after performing at the Lollapalooza India 2024 festival in the city.
